name: Mocade
title: Black Mocade
text: Hey look up! It's a plane! No, It's a bird! No, it's the assassino.

name: zipper
title: No zipper dress
text: The price of this dress has been cut off since we lost a zipper on the back.

name: ernest
title: Dear Ernest
text: We'll bring readers to the edge of ther seats and keep them there until we sell this dress.
